title: Bug 124777 - Setting blank tooltip in chart title causing exception when previewing
OB: When previewing the chart in the viewer and moving the mouse over the chart title, an unexpected exception dialog pops up.
EB: When previewing the chart in the viewer and moving the mouse over the chart title, nothing should happen.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Add title interactivity: enable mouseover and show tooltip.
3. Keep the tooltip text blank and click the 'Add' button.
